import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import getData from "../../utils/getData" export const MainPage = () => { const questions = useSelector(state => state.questions.questions) console.log(questions) return (
{questions.map(question => { return (
{question.title}

{question.author} at {getData.question.data}

{question.text}

Likes: 11 Comments: 120
) })}
